CustomField.description: Check this box if one or more of your PureConnect workgroups require wrap-up codes. Wrap-ups may not work as expected in Internet Explorer when multiple browser tabs or windows are open.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if one or more of your PureConnect workgroups require wrap-up codes. Wrap-ups may not work as expected in Internet Explorer when multiple browser tabs or windows are open.
CustomField.label: Enable Wrap-ups
